description: Create or update a secret in a key vault in the specified subscription.  NOTE: This API is intended for internal use in ARM deployments. Users should use the data-plane REST service for interaction with vault secrets.

parameters.description: Parameters to create or update the secret

location.description: The supported Azure location where the key vault should be created.

id.description: The Azure Resource Manager resource ID for the key vault.

name.description: The name of the key vault.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group to which the vault belongs.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

type.description: The resource type of the key vault.

tags.description: The tags that will be assigned to the key vault.
